main event: Several witnesses reported a bright light with noticeable haze at about the 12 o'clock high position in the east, which then departed and disappeared near Castle AFT, Merced, California on 1 October 1956.
interesting points: The object was described as possibly being a light with a blue and white color., Witnesses observed the bright light climb back into clouds., The sighting lasted approximately 30 seconds with some intermittent cloud cover., A second light was observed about 10-15 seconds alongside the main object., There is a slight possibility that this sighting was a searchlight.
